price: Nígbà tí arákùnrin wọn, (Ànábì) Hūd, sọ pé: “Ṣé ẹ kò níí bẹ̀rù (Allāhu) ni?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūna
